bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: The device_info_list turns empty if unmatched key is given to the create_image_acquirer method
bug.description:
Describe the bug The device_info_list turns empty if unmatched key is given to the create_image_acquirer method. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Pass search keys, which never met to any candidate, to the create_image_acquirer method. For example create_image_acquirer(serial_number='nobody has this serial number'). Check the length of the device_info_list object. You'll see it's empty.
Expected behavior The device_info_list must not be empty even if any unmatch key is given. Additional context None.
